xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.10 Hetuduka, Ācayagāmittika » 1.10.1 Ācayagāmipada » 1.10.1.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Ācayagāmittika
Ācayagāmipada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
312.
639Hetu ācayagāmī dhammo hetussa ācayagāmissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
313.
640Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
641Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
642Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
643(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetvādiup1.10.2 Apacayagāmipada >>
